I"m afraid I'm going to have to agree with Jason on this one. 
Yanshosh is a dang good RPGer and knows the rules.  He plays by the 
rules.  That is why he's that strong and has lead the Allience this 
long. I want to be mean or put anyone down. But in this RPG, anything 
goes. Just RPG and let what happens happen. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jason Lind" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
> [I am saying this to be mean but tell the truth you are really full 
of 
> yourself. the reason zardus is hard to beat is because he usually 
has 
> hostages to use. its because yanshosh knows how to rpg good. and as 
a 
> personal favor please don't gloat.]
>
